TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IUnrestrictedPermission

summary.span: 允许一种权限公开其为无限制状态。

span.span: Allows a permission to expose an unrestricted state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所有代码访问权限应都实现。All code access permissions should implement . ## Examples 此示例演示如何定义使用代码访问安全性使用权限类。This example shows how to define a permission class for use with code access security. 实现了所有必需的权限接口。All of the necessary permission interfaces are implemented. 下面的代码示例演示的行为方法。The following code example demonstrates the behavior of the methods. 该示例旨在演示如何执行方法是否你从你的代码执行方法。The example is intended to show how the methods perform if you execute the methods from your code. 安全基础结构; 一般情况下，使用权限类的方法它们通常不使用应用程序中。In general, the methods of permission classes are used by the security infrastructure; they are not typically used in applications. summary.span: 返回一个值，该值指示是否允许不受限制的访问权限所保护的资源。

span.span: Returns a value indicating whether unrestricted access to the resource protected by the permission is allowed.

returns.span: 如果允许不受限制地使用受此权限所保护的资源，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if unrestricted use of the resource protected by the permission is allowed; otherwise, .
